00041 class DriftChamberParameter : public LCFixedObject<kNDriftChamberParameterInts,kNDriftChamberParameterFloats,0> {
00042 public: 
00043   DriftChamberParameter() : LCFixedObject<kNDriftChamberParameterInts,kNDriftChamberParameterFloats,0>() { };
00044     
00047   DriftChamberParameter(LCObject* obj) : LCFixedObject<kNDriftChamberParameterInts,kNDriftChamberParameterFloats,0>(obj) { } 
00048   
00049 
00052   DriftChamberParameter &  setDriftVelocity(float drift_velocity) 
00053   {
00054     obj()->setFloatVal(kDriftChamberParameterFloatVelocity, drift_velocity );
00055     return *this;
00056   };
00057 
00060   float getDriftVelocity() const
00061   {
00062     return getFloatVal(kDriftChamberParameterFloatVelocity);
00063   };
00064

00068   {
00069     obj()->setFloatVal(kDriftChamberParameterFloatDelay, time_shift);
00070     return *this;
00071   };

00076   {
00077     return getFloatVal(kDriftChamberParameterFloatDelay);
00078   };

00086     return getFloatVal(kDriftChamberParameterFloatDelay);
00087   };
00088 #endif

00134 
00137   DriftChamberParameter &  setDirectionSign(int sign) 
00138   {
00139     obj()->setIntVal(kDriftChamberParameterIntWireType, getIntVal(kDriftChamberParameterIntWireType) & (~1) + sign % 2);
00140     return *this;
00141   };
00142 
00145   int getDirectionSign() const 
00146   { 
00147     int wire_type= getIntVal(kDriftChamberParameterIntWireType);
00148     if (wire_type<0) return -1;
00149     return (wire_type%2==0 ? -1 : 1);
00150   };
00151 
00153   float calcPos(float time) const {
00154     return getOffsetU()+getDirectionSign() * ( time - getDelay()) * getDriftVelocity();
00155   };
00156 
00158   float calcTime(float pos) const {
00159     return getDirectionSign()*(pos-getOffsetU()) / getDriftVelocity() + getDelay() ;
00160   };
00161 
00163   float calcDelay(float residual) const {
00164     return residual*getDirectionSign()/getDriftVelocity()+getDelay();
00165   };
00166 
00172   EDriftChamberWireType getWireType() const {
00173     int wire_type= getIntVal(kDriftChamberParameterIntWireType);
00174     if (wire_type<0) return kDriftChamberWireMinus;
00175     return static_cast<EDriftChamberWireType>(wire_type);
00176   };
00177 
00180   void setWireType(int wire_type)  {
00181 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00182     assert (wire_type<=kNWireTypes) ;
00183 #endif    
00184     obj()->setIntVal(kDriftChamberParameterIntWireType, wire_type);
00185   }

00196     return std::string("DriftChamberParameter");

00201   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00202     std::stringstream message;
00203     message << "i[" << kNDriftChamberParameterInts << "]: sign of drift direction"
00204             << "f[" << kNDriftChamberParameterFloats << "]: velovity, time shift, z, u offsets, error.";
00205     return message.str();
00206   };

00217   inline float calculateDriftVelocity(float drift_time_u, float drift_time_next_u,
00218                                       const DriftChamberParameter &axis_u,  
00219                                       const DriftChamberParameter &next_axis_u) {
00220     float total_drift_time=
00221         drift_time_u      - axis_u.getDelay()
00222       + drift_time_next_u - next_axis_u.getDelay();
00223     
00224     // TODO: apply correction due to track inclination ? 
00225     
00226     float total_drift_distance=
00227         fabs( axis_u.getOffsetU() - next_axis_u.getOffsetU() );
00228     
00229     float drift_velocity=total_drift_distance/total_drift_time;
00230     
00231     //    std::cout << "drift_time_tot=" << drift_time_u << "+" << drift_time_next_u << " = " << total_drift_time
00232     //                << " distance=" <<     axis_u.getOffsetU() << " +  " << next_axis_u.getOffsetU()
00233     //                << " = " << total_drift_distance 
00234     //                << " -> " << drift_velocity << std::endl;
00235     return drift_velocity;
00236   }
